name: Hemant Singh
college: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology

education.school: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology
education.field_of_study: Computer Science and Engineering with Artificial Intelligence

projects.name: Image Caption Generation Using Generative AI
projects.description: Pioneered an AI-driven image captioning tool using LLAMA 2.0, achieving 90% accuracy on a 50,000-image dataset, streamlining workflows with Flask and Node.js, and cutting manual annotation by 80%.

projects.name: Risk Management Tool
projects.description: Engineered a comprehensive risk management tool using Azure AI Studios and Azure Machine Learning, visualizing loan default risks and enhancing mitigation strategies; analyzed 10,000+ loan records with Tableau and Power BI, reducing default rates by 30%.

projects.name: Online Based Election System using block chain
projects.description: Engineered a blockchain-based online election system, leveraging distributed server technology to ensure secure electronic voting, successfully handling 5,000+ votes and decreasing election fraud by 95%.

projects.name: Enhancing the Maternity and Child Care Health
projects.description: Implemented a real-time location and responsive chatbot interface using MapMyIndia and ChatGPT APIs, revolutionizing maternity and child care for over 200 patients and cutting scheduling time by 60%.

experiences.description: Revolutionized traditional teaching methods by incorporating AR/VR, resulting in a 50% increase in student participation and a 35% improvement in overall academic performance across multiple subjects. Python-Based Student Assistance Chatbot: Design a chatbot to 2x the speed and assist students in their queries. Transformed raw data through detailed cleaning and preprocessing, then created a Dashboard that delivered real-time student performance insights, slashing manual reporting time by 40% and boosting data accuracy by 30%. Work upon Python frameworks such as Tkinter, and Implement 3 module page.

Evaluated student data from over 1,000 records to support the development of the college's ERP system. Generate a Flask-based module an online admissions process, reducing time by 30% and handling over 500 applications annually. Maintained direct communication with over 4 clients to ensure project alignment and satisfaction. Analyzed data from 80+ users to gather insights for better decision-making. Assisted in creating the SRS document for 4 major projects.

full_output.name: Hemant Singh
